63A.comments: This is a core course for the Diploma in Education - Teacher-Librarianship, the Certificate in Teacher-Librarianship, and the Diploma in Education - Literacy Education. Registration will be blocked when the course is full. A priority sequence waitlist is available for this course (LLED 463 W3A). For information about how LLED wait lists function, please visit https://pdce.educ.ubc.ca/online-courses/.
